text: Shopify aapko apnay customers ka data asani say collect karnay ka moqa deta hai.  Is say aap unko target kar kay apnay products aur offers promote kar saktay hain.
Shopify kay through aap apnay customers ko different offers aur discounts kay sath retarget kar saktay hain. Is say aap apnay sales ko bohat zyada badha saktay hain.

Ek professional Shopify store banany say aap apnay customers ki nazron main zyada credible aur trustworthy ban jatay hain.  Is say unka aap kay products main trust badhta hai aur zyada sales hoti hain.
Apna Shopify store aaj hi banayen aur in zabardast faydon say faida uthayn! DM karen launch ya fix karwany kay liye, ya hamary portfolio ko check karen. ROI badhanay wali tips kay liye follow karen!
